author: @juanrojas6502
text: I‚Äôm not a data analyst and, aside from my personal projects, I have zero experience as a data analyst, but I‚Äôm looking to pivot into the industry within the next year. While I think you have to have a fundamental understanding of excel and analysis for an entry position, I do think one of the most important aspect to data analysis is the final part - communicating your insights. You can be the best at cleaning, analyzing, and creating visuals, but if you can‚Äôt communicate your insights, you aren‚Äôt an effective data analyst. So, even though it may be counterintuitive, it might be beneficial to start with the visualization tools or learning how to effectively communicate first and then move onto the others. What are your thoughts?
